argument.description: An expression that specifies a row that is hypothetically inserted into a group of rows.
Specifies the order of the rows from the same grouping set that are processed in the aggregation.
The sort key can be a column name or a sort-key-expression.

description: The PERCENT_RANK function returns the relative percentile rank of a row that is hypothetically inserted into a group of rows.
sample:
SELECT PERCENT_RANK(47000) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SALARY) 
      INTO :PR FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE WORKDEPT = 'A00'
